name: Madness In Space
description:
MiS is a Platformer game, you're playing as Antonin, an astronaut who's been left alone in a Spaceship.



Gameplay Instructions       

          PC keys :
 CONTROLS WALK - W,A,S,D 
RUN - LEFT SHIFT 
INTERACT - E
SWAP - Q
PAUSE GAME - ESCAPE      
           CONTROLLER keys :

CONTROLS WALK - LEFT THUMBSTICK
RUN - LEFT TRIGGER // RIGHT TRIGGER
INTERACT - SQUARE (PS4) // X (Xbox)
SWAP - TRIANGLE (PS4) // Y (XBox)
PAUSE GAME - OPTIONS BUTTON (PS4) // START BUTTON (XBox)

KNOWN GAMEPLAY ISSUES
In First Room (Village Forest) --> Green Fire Spirit missing --> Go To Main Menu 

Scenario \SPOILER ALERT/

Antonin, an astronaut, has been left alone in a Spaceship.
One day, he wokes up from hypersleep, with memory deficiency.
But he has one goal, get back to earth.
He will run through the ship to repair it, but he's slowly falling in madness since he's alone.
But Five, his cat helps him to repair the ship and not falling in madness.
Through the story, Antonin will slowly recover his memory ...
